A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: From flying space nuns\, to scenes where nothing got accomplished\, but to waste time and put more scenery in the movie\, to obvious ideological beliefs of the director and president of Lucasarts being shoved down our throats\, this movie severely dissapointed me.  The writer and director basically disregarded all prior lore and canon and physics to push his own story on this utter garbage.  If you truly want to watch this movie\, watch it for free somehow and do not give money to Disney for this trash.
